"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/536cf1056368725f34370000#post_536cf1056368725f34370000
[bq="twistedmetalero"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/536cf066636872603c6b0000#post_536cf066636872603c6b0000

dont worry, doctors cant cure stupidity, and that alone its enough for the news to have things to report.
[/bq]
Actually China's BGI is trying to sequence 2000 geniuses to see if there really is such a thing as the "genius" gene.


Speaking of genetics there may be a cure for hiv/aids on the way.  What the latest breakthrough is that they take the patient's T-cells(part of the immune system) inject them with a rare mutation of the CCR5 gene, inject it back into the patient and presto.  There also may be a cure for cancer as well; a woman had experimental gene therapy done and her immune system as a result started attacking cancer cells.
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/536cf1056368725f34370000#post_536cf1056368725f34370000

there is people who refuse to take vaccines today, there will be people not willing to get nanomachines in the future.[/bq]
It's cause of crap like this that polio is back.  When we almost had polio wiped off the face of the map the anti-vaccine movement came about.

topics.body:
I can feel my faith in humanity starting to dwindle.

Some dudes on some show, don't ask me cause I don't watch it, apparently got fired for saying some shit about glbt and now the news is defending it going, "Gay agenda's destroyun muh religious freedums!" or some shit.  So the last couple months they've defended racists, sexists, homophobes, are digging up nearly twenty year old news calling it news under the pretence of "freedums!"

It's official I have lost any and all respect for 24/7's credibility.  At this rate ten years from now we're going to see protests, political rallies and news featuring racists, sexists and homophobes trying to stop "discrimination against my freedoms!"



Here's a fucking wake up call to the 24/7 news and anyone else that thinks freedom of speech means only freedom of speech towards individuals of a like mind; free speech means freedom of prosecution from the government for what you say, it does not cover threats, threatening people and just cause a person has the right to be racist/sexist/homophobe doesn't mean they have to be protected and coddled like a infant from those "big bad meanies".  If someone is racist/homophobic or sexist it is totally within a company's rights to fire you for this cause freedom of speech does not cover your ass when you're in hot water.  If you say something racist/sexist/homophobic at work there is a damn high chance that you're going to get fired for this cause freedom of speech does not cover this.

My problem with these people is that they're going on about "freedoms" while demanding special legal protection that excludes anyone that doesn't believe the same thing as them.  You want to know why so many people are getting fired for this shit lately?  Cause you didn't fucking look at your company's rules for being a employee.  If you're racist/homophobic/sexist or so forth and your company says they're a equal opportunity employer you're going to wind up getting your ass fired.



Tl:dr; I'm getting tired of the dumbasses on the news.  Freedom of speech covers freedom of prosecution for unpopular opinions against the government it does not mean freedom to say whatever the hell you want whenever you want or to whatever extreme you want.  If you're racist/homophobic/sexist and you work for a equal opportunity employer it's 100% within the company's rights to fire you.  If you're so concerned about your "freedums" then go work at a company that isn't a equal opportunity or stfu already.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
If anyone here ever faces discrimination in the workforce here's a way to instantly shut it down; look at your company guidelines and see if they're a equal opportunity employer, also many states have laws against discrimination in the workforce and there are many national laws against discrimination in the workforce.  Take what you can find, shove it up to their face, make them read it and watch their face turn pale white realizing that they could get fired.

Some jackass at work calling you a "shank/hoe/n****r/f****t" or so forth?  Take the company guidelines, shove it up to their face and make them read it.  Why does this work?  Cause freedom of speech does not cover calling people "shank/hoe/n****r/f****t" and so forth.  So people do not have the right to call others n*****r, freedom of speech does not cover this.
